pages.text:
DQ® History, Headquarters & About Us | Dairy Queen®
Our Mission
TO CREATE POSITIVE MEMORIES FOR ALL WHO TOUCH DQ
®
Our Vision
TO BE THE WORLD'S FAVORITE QUICK-SERVICE RESTAURANT
Our Values
BETTER TOGETHER: We collaborate with and are accountable to each other, our company and communities.
FORWARD THINKING: We anticipate change and translate strategic ideas into action to build a strong future for our company.
INCLUSIVE & DIVERSE: We believe in and are committed to creating an environment where everyone feels welcome and valued.
EMPOWERED: We strive for continuous improvement, making decisions to influence and advance change and develop better solutions.
Our Story
1940: First
Dairy Queen
®
restaurant opens in Joliet, Illinois.
1949: Malts and shakes debut.
1951: Banana splits appear on the menu.
1953: First
Dairy Queen
restaurant opens in Canada.
1955: The
Dilly
®
Bar debuts.
1957: The
Dairy Queen
Brazier
®
concept is introduced.
1959: First
Dairy Queen
restaurant opens in Panama.
1962: International Dairy Queen, Inc. (IDQ) is formed.
1968: The
Buster Bar
®
Treat appears on the menu.
1971:
Peanut Buster
®
Parfait debuts on the menu.
1979: First
Dairy Queen
restaurant opens in the Middle East.
1984: Partnership with Children’s Miracle Network Hospitals and Children’s Miracle Network begins.
1985:
Blizzard
®
Treats are introduced.
1988: IDQ purchases
Orange Julius
®
Brand
1991: First
Dairy Queen
restaurant opens in Mexico.
1992: First
Dairy Queen
restaurant opens in China.
1995:
DQ Treatzza Pizza
®
and Chicken Strip Basket debut.
1998: IDQ acquired by Berkshire Hathaway, Inc.
2003: The
Blizzard
of the Month program kicks off.
2005: GrillBurgers are introduced.
2006: First Miracle Treat Day in Canada and the U.S.
2010: Mini
Blizzard
Treats are introduced.
2015: The
DQ
system celebrates its 75
th
Fanniversary.
2018:
DQ m
obile app launches.
2019: First
DQ
restaurant with the Next Gen design opens.
2020: The Non-Dairy
Dilly
®
Bar debuts.
COMPANY OVERVIEW
International Dairy Queen Inc., (IDQ), headquartered in Minneapolis, Minnesota, is the parent company of American Dairy Queen Corporation and Dairy Queen Canada, Inc. Through its subsidiaries, IDQ develops, licenses and services a system of more than 7,700 DQ restaurants in more than 20 countries. IDQ is a subsidiary of Berkshire Hathaway Inc., which is led by Warren Buffett, the legendary investor and CEO of Berkshire.
Corporate citizenship
Bringing health and happiness to kids everywhere
Learn More
Join us in sweet success
Build something lasting with DQ® restaurants
Franchise With Us

Dairy Queen® Customer Service: Phone & Form Submission
Contact Us
We're here to answer your questions
Need assistance with the
DQ
®
App or
DQ
®
Points and Rewards?
mobile app faqs
Looking for a quick answer or have a
general question about our products and restaurants?
check out our faqs
Have comments regarding a particular
DQ
®
restaurant? Please contact the independent franchise operator for immediate and personal assistance.
FIND A STORE
Contact Us Form
DQ
®
restaurants are independently owned and operated franchised locations that have served customers for 85 years. The independent franchise operators of
DQ
restaurants and their employees, together with American Dairy Queen Corporation (ADQ), strive to provide customers with the best products and service possible. Your feedback is important because it enables
DQ
franchise owners and ADQ to ensure that they maintain high standards of products and service.
If you have comments regarding a particular
DQ
restaurant, please contact the independent franchise operator of that location directly so that they may personally and immediately assist you. Use the
Store Locator
to obtain the contact information for that restaurant.
You may also use the form on this page to provide feedback to ADQ regarding one of its franchised restaurants, and the Corporate ADQ Team will forward your comments directly to the independent franchise operator of that location for you.
Our Corporate Fan Relations contact center team is available Monday through Friday from 9:00 AM to 9:00 PM Central Time and Saturday and Sunday from 10:00 AM to 6:00 PM Central Time. Call toll free: 1-866-793-7582.
Interested in franchising a
DQ
restaurant? Learn more here:
Franchise With Us
